casebody.data:
Mary Ann MCANDREW, Individually and as Trustee of the Mary Ann McAndrew Revocable Living Trust dated March 11, 2005, Plaintiff-Appellant/Cross-Appellee,
v.
ASSOCIATION OF APARTMENT OWNERS OF KUAPA ISLE, an unincorporated condominium association, by its Board of Directors; Gerry Bogert; Garry Brechin; Jim Dittmar ; Mark Elwell ; Howard Tocman; and Fred Wong, Defendants-Appellees/Cross-Appellants,
and
John Does 1-50; Jane Does 1-50; Doe Partnerships 1-50; Doe Corporations 1-50; Doe Entities 1-50; and Doe Governmental Units 1-50, Defendants. Association of Apartment Owners of Kuapa Isle, an unincorporated condominium association, by its Board of Directors, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Mary Ann McAndrew, Individually and as Trustee of the Mary Ann McAndrew Revocable Living Trust dated March 11, 2005, Defendant-Appellant,
and
John Does 1-50; Jane Does 1-50; Doe Partnerships 1-50; Doe Corporations 1-50; Doe Entities 1-50; and Doe Governmental Units 1-50, Defendants. NO. CAAP-17-0000568
NO. CAAP-17-0000612 (CONSOLIDATED) Intermediate Court of Appeals of Hawai'i. August 23, 2019.

SUMMARY DISPOSITION ORDER

Affirm.
